snippet: The family and a close friend of Nicole Mansfield said the news delivered by the F.B.I. that she had been in Syria and was killed came as a shock.
abstract: Family and close friends of Nicole Mansfield, Michigan woman who was reported killed in Syria, react to her death with shock; pro-government news media agencies in Syria claim Mansfield and a British man were among three people killed during confrontation with government forces and say she was working on behalf of a rebel group.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Michael S. Schmidt in Washington, Hwaida Saad in Beirut, Lebanon, and Jaclyn Trop in Detroit.

lead_paragraph: The family and a close friend of Nicole Mansfield said the news delivered by the F.B.I. that she had been in Syria and was killed came as a shock.

headline.main: Michigan Woman Killed in Syria War, Reports Say
headline.print_headline: Michigan Woman Killed In Syria War, Reports Say
